```{r Library Setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r Reading, Cleaning, Mutating, and Counting Rows/Columns Subway Data, echo = FALSE}
## Read Data
subway_data = read_csv(file = "./NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_AND_Exit_Data.csv")
## Clean, Select, and Mutate
cleaned_subway_data = janitor::clean_names(subway_data)
selected_subway_data = select(cleaned_subway_data, line, station_name, station_latitude, station_longitude, route1:route11, entry, vending, entrance_type, ada) %>% mutate(entry = recode(entry, "YES" = TRUE, "NO" = FALSE)) 
## Counting Columns and Rows
nrow(selected_subway_data)
ncol(selected_subway_data)
```
